text: Minier is a French surname. ==Origin== In French, the word means mining, in the sense of pertaining or related to mining.http://www.cnrtl.fr/definition/minier ==Notable people== Notable people with this surname include: * Christine Minier (born 1964), French singer * Daniel D. Minier (1794–1849), American soldier * Ethan B. Minier (1874–1958), American politician * Karen Minier (born 1973), Belgian television presenter * Nelson Minier, pseudonym of Adrien Stoutenburg (1916–1982), American writer * Theodore L. Minier (1819–1895), American politician ==See also== * Menier * Meunier * Mounier * Munier ==References==
title: Minier
